Amazon suggested to me to buy the XXL size, but it was too big. I ordered it again in XL and that was a better fit. I'm 5'3" and weigh 187lbs I'm about 35.5 inches around at the waist. This dress is very open at the top and around the neckline, there is plenty of room to accommodate a large chest, but may feel too large if you have a smaller chest. However the ribbon across the chest can be adjusted and tightened to create a better fit at the top. The two bows at the waistline come as separate pieces with safety pins so you can attach them to the dress. I took the safety pins off and sewed the ribbons onto my dress. I wore it with a petticoat underneath for extra volume.

This dress was not true to size. It was much smaller and the fit was poor. For the price I expected the material to be softer and the fit better. It was not at all flattering. The bows are also connected to pins to put on the dress. Not even sewn on. There's no stretch or give in the material. I ended up returning it the same day it arrived.

It came a couple sizes too small for me, but I plan to lose the weight, so I kept it. Well made, full, ruffly, and very cute. Bows are not attached, came with safety pins which is a bit odd, but I added them to two other dresses I have, and this dress is not lacking for their absence.

Dress fits true to size, however the zipper is so weak and poorly made, you cant zip up the back of the dress! I tried pulling it with a string, straightening out the zipper treads and even used wax and vaseline to try and slide it up! nothing works!

awesome purchase!! i think this great for people trying out lolita for the first time on a budget, could also work as a halloween costume. it looks nice even without a petticoat!! (i am not wearing a petticoat in these). it’s not scratchy or uncomfortably snug either! just be sure to look at the sizing chart for a flattering fit- every sizing system is different depending on where you’re buying from, but your measurements will always get you the best fit possible.

评论概述: Very beautiful dress, but difficult to review for measurement struggles.
评论详情: Very beautiful dress, well made and seems sturdy. I ordered the L size to match my 40,32,40 measurements, but there are several problems. Firstly, i could not zip up the zipper past my waist, the dress was too tight around that area and above. At the top of the zipper, worn, it was about a half inch too tight.  I ended up deciding to return this dress, and go for the XL, but the difficulties continued. The dress, while being able to be zipped up, was much larger than the L. it was no longer form fitting, and felt a little extra baggy. This is not too much of an issue due to the ribbons allowing you to tighten, but there's something to be said about a form fitting over looseness being tightened, it just feels better. But that wasn't the main issue. The XL's largest problem was the upper area around the chest and shoulders. Zipping up the zipper fully, I could put the full length of my fingers between the top of the zipper and the back of my neck, a length of about 4 or 5 inches. The collar is far too loose, making the upper part of the dress feel very loose as a whole.  Ultimately, I was unable to find a size that fit me right, but at least the XL is somewhat wearable. The dress itself is a wonderful piece, but the measurement windows are not inclusive enough for all shapes and sizes. You may or may not have trouble getting the right size that fits just right.

This is a good dress for a Halloween witch costume. I wear a US 16 with a 40C bust and got the 2X which just barely fits. The sleeves are a little uncomfortably tight, plenty of extra room in the chest, the waist is also a little tight and higher than I expected. For what I'm doing with it, this is plenty good enough. I feel like the bottom is plenty puffy enough without a petticoat, though you might want the pop of color. There are two layers to the skirt; the top layer with the ribbon and lace details and the bottom layer which has two ruffles (which makes it almost look like 3 layers.) The ribbon in the bust area can be removed and replaced (I plan to put some light up wire there, will update with a photo if it works). The side skirt ribbons and the back tie are sewed in.
I loved this dress! Usually I’m a XS but a S fit me great, I love it, no complaints here.
